name: Tales of the Tunneler (DEMO)
description:
Enter the Covington Mines, a mineshaft closed because of the emergence of monsters from deep within the earth. Along the way, you will discover horrible creatures and awesome materials alike.

--

This game is a demo! We will add MANY more things to the game in the coming months! The demo is free, but feel free to donate to support the development of the full game! (And/or you can buy the OST (soundtrack))

--

Support us:

  • Twitter
  • Patreon
  • Instagram
  • Discord Server

--

Plans for the full game (including but not limited to):

  • Add MORE floors
  • More enemies & items
  • New capabilities (enchanting, brewing, cooking, etc)
  • Boss fights
  • Improve combat
